introduction: Scikit-learn is Python library offering classical machine-learning algorithms, model evaluation, and preprocessing utilities., but it might not be the perfect fit for everyone. Whether you're looking for different features, better pricing, or specialized capabilities, there are excellent alternatives available. This guide compares the top 9 Scikit-learn alternatives to help you find the best ml frameworks tool for your needs.
